column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''7''' is the seventh issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

* "Transitions in Translations<ref>Contents of the column: "'Edition Shifting' in the Spanish LotR", "Bored in Germany", "Unwind with a Good Book", "Trivia Question".</ref> (column) — edited by [[Arden R. Smith]].
* "Essitalmar: 'What's In a Name?'" (column) — edited by [[Tom Loback]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
